name: quizlet-set-converter
description: A simple web extension that allows you to easily convert a Quizlet set into a Vocabustudy set

scripts.zip: npm run zip:single --tg=firefox && npm run zip:single --tg=chrome
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.build:single: rm -rf "build/$npm_config_tg" && cp -r "src/$npm_config_tg" build && cp -r src/common/ "build/$npm_config_tg" && cp -r src/_locales "build/$npm_config_tg"
scripts.build: mkdir build && npm run build:single --tg=firefox && npm run build:single --tg=chrome

author: Vocabustudy Developers <management@vocabustudy.org>
